name: Transporter Truck Drive Simulator 3D
description:
How does truck driving differs from speed car driving? It's not about high speed and extreme driving – you can just enjoy your journey and also do some useful work – transport weight. In Transporter Truck Drive Simulator 3D driving game you can fully feel this atmosphere.

HOW TO PLAY: Drive your truck carefully, deliver your freight to the point of destinations safely. Try not to crash. Prepare to a really long and amazing journey as a truck driver!

Transporter Truck Drive Simulator 3D game features:
• Truck driving simulator in 3D;
• Beautiful landscapes;
• Realistic controlling – feel like a real driver;
• High-quality graphics.

Enjoy long calm trip in Transporter Truck Drive Simulator 3D!
